Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup

Interface RSGroupInfoManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
DisabledRSGroupInfoManager, RSGroupInfoManagerImpl
@Private public interface RSGroupInfoManager
Interface used to manage RSGroupInfo storage. An implementation has the option to support offline mode. See RSGroupBasedLoadBalancer.
